title: Happy Thanksgiving!
description: Maddie and Emily wish you a Happy Thanksgiving, and explain how you can support the show. Find and donate to your local public radio station at donate.npr.org/short. Follow Maddie and Emily on Twitter @maddie_sofia and @emilykwong1234. Email the show at shortwave@npr.org.

itunes:title: Happy Thanksgiving!

itunes:subtitle: Gobble gobble.
